EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Program Owner when Program Approver approves the Program
EmailTemplate.name: Program Approved Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Program #{!Program__c.Name} has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification that the Program # {!Program__c.Name} has been approved
Hello {!Program__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you that the Program # {!Program__c.Name} has been approved. To activate the program go to the record by clicking here.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
